name: Hilti KB3 Bolt 3/8" x 3"
description: A stainless steel expansion-type bolt for rock climbing routes. To use it you drill the hole, hammer in the stud, and draw it out with a wrench to tighten the collar. The dog-point end prevents the starter threads from being harmed by hammering.Made of 304 stainless steel.A textured expansion sleeve helps grip rock when being tightened.Note: for use with 3/8in. bits. Do not use 10mm bits.
